languages.text: "Годьерда, мы ведем дознание. Отвечай на вопросы леди Кибеллы. Надеюсь, твой доклад будет полезен".

traits.locale_text: "Годьерда, вот та, о ком я говорила. Ассасин культа смерти, направленная Лорд-капитаном по следу изменников в эти палаты. Надеюсь, твой доклад поможет ей взять след".

languages.text: "Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."
languages.original_text: "Годьерда, мы ведем дознание. Отвечай на вопросы леди Кибеллы. Надеюсь, твой доклад будет полезен".

traits.locale_text: "Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer Lady Kibellah's questions. I hope your report will be useful."
"Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer Lady Kibellah's questions. I hope your report will be useful."
"Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer Lady Kibellah's questions. I hope your report will be useful."
"Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer Lady Kibellah's questions. I hope your report will be useful."
"Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."
"Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."

languages.text: "Godierda, wir führen eine Ermittlung durch. Beantwortet die Fragen der Spinnerin. Ich hoffe, Euer Bericht wird nützlich sein."
languages.original_text: "Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."

traits.locale_text: "Godierda, wir führen eine Ermittlung durch. Beantwortet die Fragen der Spinnerin. Ich hoffe, Euer Bericht wird nützlich sein."

languages.text: «Godierda, estamos realizando una investigación. Responda a las preguntas de la tejedora. Espero que su informe sea útil».
languages.original_text: "Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."

traits.locale_text: «Godierda, estamos realizando una investigación. Responda a las preguntas de la tejedora. Espero que su informe sea útil».

languages.text: 「ゴディエルダ、我々は調査を行っているのです。紡績工の質問に答えなさい。あなたの報告が役立つものであることを願いますよ」
languages.original_text: "Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."

traits.locale_text: 「ゴディエルダ、我々は調査を行っているのです。織り手の質問に答えなさい。あなたの報告が役立つものであることを願いますよ」

languages.text: “戈迪亚达，我们正在进行调查。赶紧回答织网者的问题，希望你的回答能派上用场。”
languages.original_text: "Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."

traits.locale_text: “戈迪亚达，我们正在进行调查。赶紧回答织网者的问题，希望你的回答能派上用场。”

languages.text: « Godierda, nous menons une enquête. Répondez aux questions de la tisseuse. J'espère que votre rapport nous sera utile. »
languages.original_text: "Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."

traits.locale_text: « Godierda, nous menons une enquête. Répondez aux questions de la tisseuse. J'espère que votre rapport nous sera utile. »

languages.text: "Godierda, soruşturma yürütüyoruz. Dokurun sorularına cevap ver. Raporunun işe yarayacağını umuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Godierda, we are conducting an inquest. Answer the spinner's questions. I hope your report will be useful."
